channel.title: Invoices on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Invoices on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: BO - Generate Invoice By Date
item.description: BO - Generate Invoice By Date Steps Step Description Expected result Go to Orders > “Orders” page Orders listing is displayed correctly Go to the first order page The order page is displayed successfully Change the order status to “Shipped” > Click on “Update Status” button * A “Successful update.” is well displayed * The status is changed successfully Go back to Orders > “Orders” page The order page is displayed successfully Change the order status to “Payment accepted” > Click on “Update Status” button * A “Successful update.

item.title: BO - Generate Invoice By Status
item.description: BO - Generate Invoice By Status Steps Step Description Expected result Go to the Orders > “Orders” page Orders listing is displayed correctly Go to the first order page The order page is displayed successfully Change the order status to “Shipped” > Click on “Update Status” button * A “Successful update.” is well displayed * The status is changed successfully Go back to Orders > “Orders” page The order page is displayed successfully Change the order status to “Payment accepted” > Click on “Update Status” button * A “Successful update.
